raw_text: Based on the Galaxyarchitecture (Goddeau et al, 1994), Jupiter recognizes user question over the phone, parses the question with the TINA language understanding system (Seneff,1992) and generates SQL and natural language answer with the GENESIS system (Baptist and Seneff, 2000)
